column1: Rule <ASSIST> Can you help me with <TASK>
Action <INFO> * <TOPIC> news Here is the latest news for today.
Action <INFO> * <TOPIC> weather The weather today is sunny.
Action <INFO> * <TOPIC> stocks The stock market is up by 2%.
Action <INFO> * <TOPIC> sports The local team won their game today.
Action <ASSIST> * <TASK> homework Sure, what do you need help with in your homework?
Action <ASSIST> * <TASK> project Of course, what part of the project are you struggling with?
Action <ASSIST> * <TASK> test I can help you study for your test. Which topic are you having trouble with?
Action <ASSIST> * <TASK> report Sure, I can help you with your report. What information do you need?
Action Sorry, I don't understand your request. Please try again.
